cases.title: Urology Expert Witness Testifies in Cialis Patent Infringement Suit
cases.description: An Texas District Court judge allowed an Urology Expert Witness to testify on issues concerning the prescription of Cialis, but not the marketing of the drug.

cases.title: Securities Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Arbitration Dispute
cases.description: A Securities Expert Witness was allowed to testify in a Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA) dispute as to whether arbitration was proper.

cases.title: Oncology Expert Witness Excluded from Testifying in Wrongful Death Case
cases.description: The Michigan Court of Appeals denied an Oncology Expert Witness from testifying regarding cancer survivor rates due to improper methodology.
